name: 1 - Turn 2
_source: speak;Amon; So, the humans are fighting my father's soldiers?{w} It is only a matter of time before they lose{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Wait, I sense{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I sense something is off{tgm}...
speak;Maya; Ooh, humans to kill, my prince!{w} Might I join the slaughter?
speak;Amon; I want to see how this plays out{tgm}...{tgm}{w} The townspeople aren't acting like themselves.{w} There is powerful magic at play here. I can sense it.
speak;Lilith; Let's go watch the fighting from the top of the mountains.{w} We can observe from there and learn more about the humans.
speak;Amon; Good idea, Lilith.{w} Follow me!
